content: Drop down here to find Captain Lotus-Vision, whom you will need to defeat. He is a particularly tricky boss, but our Captain Lotus-Vision guide goes over everything you need to know to defeat him.

This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
Drop down here to find Captain Lotus-Vision, whom you will need to defeat. He is a particularly tricky boss, but our Captain Lotus-Vision guide goes over everything you need to know to defeat him.
